Posts.Content: Hello Laretta, You are so right. I have started going back to church. I got down on my knees as well and thanked God for all the blessings in my life and gave the rest to him. The problem I have is I keep taking it back, I keep telling myself not to worry god will show me the way. I know he will I just need to keep praying, stay close to family and friends, and I will get threw this. Thanks so much for your responce it was just what I needed. God Bless, Lisa
Posts.Title: Divorce and Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Hi my name is Lisa I am 43 years old and I am new to the message board. Its not even been a year since I found out I had breast cancer, and now I find my self going threw a divorce, My husband can't deal with the cancer. After 10 years together when I need him the most he's not there. I know I can't be the only one going threw this. I really need the support of others that may be going threw the same thing or has been there and done that!!  Thanks
Posts.Title: Divorce and Breast Cancer
